title: Why are people such assholes on every single game I play?
body: I have recently got back into playing league and most of the games I have played; ranked, unranked and even bots 2-4 people on my team always tend to harass me for dying once or twice and keep saying to report me for not being the greatest player and that I should go back to bots or to quit altogether and I'm wondering why this is happening so much lately as this only ever rarely happened in the past but is now happing most games I play and am getting sick of it and am feeling like I should quit due to the number of assholes harassing me, if anybody could give me any helpful suggestions or ideas as to why this is happening I would be grateful.

replies.body: I kinda know what you mean, I also feel like the number of toxic players  has increased but it is important to remember that the mute button is a thing. I have been just muting people at the first sign of toxic behaviour and when I do I always have much better games and still win just as many without the added communication! Good luck my child!

Ranked game is where people really want to win. so u better just accept those critism if u perform poorly. OFC they should not blame you everytime you die or make mistakes. But most people play for win in ranked games, not for fun

You must be ready to be criticised if you play bad. Well, in ranked anyway. Normals and bots is where you practise, you shouldn't be flamed there. But ranked games are where people are really trying to win and if you frustrate people time and again with bad plays, then you will be criticised. Just like sport is a meritocracy, so are ranked games. Nobody gives a damn about your personality or who you are, you just need to contribute to the team and not be a liability. Aye, games are supposed to be fun. But it's not fun for the four teammates who are losing due to you.
